channel.title: whonix-gw-15 sudo apt-get update errors
channel.description:
please advise, do I just wait and try later or is there something I'm supposed to sudo nano ?
> user@host:~$ sudo apt-get update > Hit:1 https://deb.qubes-os.org/r4.0/vm buster InRelease > Hit:2 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease > Get:3 tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease [39.1 kB] > Get:4 tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease [118 kB] > Reading package lists... Done > N: Repository 'tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease' changed its 'Version' value from '' to '10' > E: Repository 'tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease' changed its 'Suite' value from 'testing' to 'stable' > N: This must be accepted explicitly before updates for this repository can be applied. See apt-secure(8) manpage for details. > N: Repository 'tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease' changed its 'Version' value from '' to '10.0' > E: Repository 'tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease' changed its 'Suite' value from 'testing' to 'stable' > N: This must be accepted explicitly before updates for this repository can be applied. See apt-secure(8) manpage for details.

item.title: whonix-gw-15 sudo apt-get update errors
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Generally:

Whonix

Stay Tuned

Stay up-to-date on the latest Whonix ™ news

i.e. always check important news first.

Specifically:

apt-get error - E: Repository 'tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease' changed its 'Suite' value from 'testing' to 'stable' News
During standard upgrade steps you might see the following error message. sudo apt-get update Hit:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster-developers InRelease Hit:2 https://deb.qubes-os.org/r4.0/vm buster InRelease Get:3 tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease [31.1 kB] Get:4 tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease [118 kB] Reading package lists... Done E: Repository 'tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/deb…

Read full topic

item.title: whonix-gw-15 sudo apt-get update errors
item.dc:creator: vts
item.description:
please advise, do I just wait and try later or is there something I’m supposed to sudo nano ?

user@host:~$ sudo apt-get update
Hit:1 https://deb.qubes-os.org/r4.0/vm buster InRelease
Hit:2 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease
Get:3 tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease [39.1 kB]
Get:4 tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease [118 kB]
Reading package lists… Done
N: Repository ‘tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease’ changed its ‘Version’ value from ‘’ to ‘10’
E: Repository ‘tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease’ changed its ‘Suite’ value from ‘testing’ to ‘stable’
N: This must be accepted explicitly before updates for this repository can be applied. See apt-secure(8) manpage for details.
N: Repository ‘tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease’ changed its ‘Version’ value from ‘’ to ‘10.0’
E: Repository ‘tor+https://cdn-aws.deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease’ changed its ‘Suite’ value from ‘testing’ to ‘stable’
N: This must be accepted explicitly before updates for this repository can be applied. See apt-secure(8) manpage for details.
